This just made my yell say “@dre@[OWNER]:Ethan: Test” in black

item.title: ::yell colour changing for different ranks
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

if (donator == 1) { titles = "@COLOR@[Donator]::"; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "@COLOR@[Moderator]::"; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "@COLOR@[Administrator]::"; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "@COLOR@[OWNER]::"; }

Change the COLOR to your desired color:
Red: red
Dark red: dre
Cyan: cya
Green: gre
Blue: blu
Yellow: yel

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell colour changing for different ranks
item.dc:creator: @ethanhello ethanhello
item.description:
@ethanhello wrote:

Hey, im trying to figure out what i type and where to change the colours of my yells. Here are my yell commands so far

if (donator == 1) { titles = "[Donator]::"; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[Moderator]::"; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Administrator]::"; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[OWNER]::"; }

Read full topic
